AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.headline: Who I Am
AboutMe.description: My name is Niko and I enjoy programming. I particularly enjoy developing solutions that simplify or automate processes. I am motivated by using technology to solve problems and make things more efficient. I value clear structures and well thought-out approaches.
AboutMe.location: I live in a house in Rheinböllen - nice and quiet, perfect for coding. Working remotely suits me perfectly because I like to be flexible and prefer to work where I feel comfortable.
AboutMe.cognition: I am always keen to expand my knowledge and learn new technologies and ways of working. Challenges motivate me to grow continuously and to focus on new, innovative solutions.
AboutMe.quality: I am solution-oriented, think analytically and persevere until a good solution is found. I enjoy working in a team, sharing my knowledge and find it exciting to develop and implement new ideas together.

Skills.title: Skill Set
Skills.headline: Technologies
Skills.description: I am currently working intensively with Angular and have a lot of experience with it. But I also regularly work with Firebase, integrate APIs and use Git for version control. I'm always curious about new technologies and like to try out new tools - for me, constant learning is simply part of development.
Skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
Skills.popup: I have a special interest in learning

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.headline: Portfolio
Projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

dataProjects.name: Join
dataProjects.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

dataProjects.name: El Pollo Loco
dataProjects.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

dataProjects.name: DA Bubble
dataProjects.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

Contact.title: Let's work together
Contact.headline: Contact me
Contact.headline2: I look forward to hearing from you!
Contact.description: Are you looking for support for your project? I'm open to exciting challenges - especially in the area of front-end development. Together we can develop solutions that really make a difference. Let's talk and see how I can enrich your team or project with my experience.
